nodes.text: Jamoh Hogra was a Zabrak mercenary who lived around the time of the Jedi Civil War. Fearful for his life after a raid on a Sith dreadnought, Hogra spent a fortune on his armor, only to be killed while in the bath by one of his many enemies. His armor eventually made its way to Eli Gand, a merchant on Kashyyyk, and his carbine rifle to Mic'tunan'jus Orgu, a merchant in Anchorhead's spaceport on Tatooine.
